condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.1: Government and partners have increased ability to strengthen inclusive and evidence-based policy making, legislation, and programming for child protection

description.narrative: UNICEF's continued engagement and advocacy with the Royal Government of Bhutan has translated into strengthened policy environment for children and young people. With UNICEF's support, the Government is embarking on drafting the first ever National Child Policy and the review of the National Youth Policy and the drafting of its Action Plan. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:28/08/2020
